text: The Apostolic Nunciature to the Emperor or Apostolic Nunciature to Emperor was an ecclesiastical office of the Catholic Church to the emperor of the Holy Roman Empire, Germany. It was a diplomatic post of the Holy See, whose representative is called the Apostolic Nuncio with the rank of an ambassador. The office ceased to exist in 1800. ==References== Emperor Category:Apostolic Nuncios to the Holy Roman Empire
title: Apostolic Nunciature to the Emperor
